Casting a vote for the grant assigned to the publication","params":{"collector":"The collector address.","data":"Arbitrary data __passed from the collector!__ to be decoded.","profileId":"The token ID of the profile associated with the publication being collected.","pubId":"The LensHub publication ID associated with the publication being collected.","referrerProfileId":"The LensHub profile token ID of the referrer's profile (different in case of mirrors)."}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"ROUND_OPERATOR_ROLE()":{"notice":"round operator role"},"calculateFee(uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Calculates and returns the collect fee of a publication."},"getPublicationData(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the publication data for a given publication, or an empty struct if that publication was not initialized with this module."},"initializePublicationCollectModule(uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Initializes data for a given publication being published.
